name: Tour of Tepeilhuitl
title: Xilonen: Tour of Tepeilhuitl
in_play_description: When your Xilonen, who has this card equipped, is on the field: When you switch to Xilonen or switch from Xilonen to another character, if the target is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, regain 1 Nightsoul point. (Twice per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Xilonen to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Xilonen, equip this card.
After Xilonen equips this card, immediately use Yohual's Scratch once.
When your Xilonen, who has this card equipped, is on the field: When you switch to Xilonen or switch from Xilonen to another character, if the target is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, regain 1 Nightsoul point. (Twice per Round)
(You must have Xilonen in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
